author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

Fix rounding in printout used in unit test of ```RecoMTD/DetLayers```, as the precision is creating issues with alternative architectures (PPC and arm).

#### PR validation:

Code runs, rounding at 4 decimal digits allows check of positions at micron level.  To be verified on alternative architectures.
title: MTD reconstruction: set fixed precision for floating point printed in unit test
